Name: Hexes
About the game: Welcome to the Hexes. An exciting and colorful puzzle game for the whole family. Drag the figures onto the playing field to fill in the empty hexagons. The game features several difficulty modes with many levels. Get hints daily as well as for the completed levels. The leisurely brain training gameplay will brighten up dozens of hours of playthrough. Enjoy your game.
